articles.title: Disneyland shuts down 11 popular rides
articles.summary: TheStreet: Disneyland shuts down 11 popular rides. Opened in 1955 as the first part of what would grow into the amusement-park empire, Disneyland in Anaheim has a total of 52 attractions, of which 49 are rides (the theme park uses this term to differentiate rides from light shows and exhibits). Not all are open at the same time as the park spaces ...

articles.title: Sealed Air (SEE) Q3 2024 Earnings Call Transcript
articles.mainIdea: Sealed Air (SEE) Q3 2024 Earnings Call Transcript
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Sealed Air (SEE) Q3 2024 Earnings Call Transcript. So I do think we have a lot of opportunities right now to improve our business as we go forward. We will always look into opportunities for footprint rationalization or areas where we think we're maybe not as successful in the future or the markets aren't growing that much. But in the grand scheme of things, I think we are very comfortable where we are today with all of the changes we're making, and we are going to drive change in those organizations. Related tickers mentioned: SEE.

articles.title: Paramount Stock Rallies After Amended Warner Offer. The Ellisons Are All-In on the Deal.
articles.mainIdea: Paramount Stock Rallies After Amended Warner Offer. The Ellisons Are All-In on the Deal.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Paramount Stock Rallies After Amended Warner Offer. The Ellisons Are All-In on the Deal.. Paramount Skydance amended its offer for Warner Bros. Discovery on Monday, guaranteeing the backing of Oracle founder Larry Ellison following the rejection last week of its hostile bid. Paramount said in a news release that it wouldn’t be raising its offer of $30 a share for all of Warner Discovery. “Our $30 per share, fully financed all-cash offer was on Dec. 4, and continues to be, the superior option to maximize value for WBD shareholders… We expect the board of directors of WBD to take the necessary steps to secure this value-enhancing transaction and preserve and strengthen an iconic Hollywood treasure for the future,” David Ellison said. Related tickers mentioned: ORCL, PSKY, WBD.
